articles.content: How important is a catwalk show to a fashion house? Important enough, in the case of Chanel, to take a team of 300 including the actor Kristen Stewart, the photographer Juergen Teller and a small arm… [+3697 chars]

articles.title: David Beckham digitally aged 30 years for moving malaria prevention appeal - Mirror Online
articles.description: David Beckham digitally aged himself up, boasting a silver fox vibe, as he urged support for Malaria Must Die, So Millions Can Live
articles.content:
David Beckham's new malaria awareness ad sees him aged up several decades. 
The footie ace, 45, looks around 70 in the ad after some digital tampering.

articles.author: Rachel Russell
articles.title: Kate to receive early Christmas present with a drawing of beloved dog Lupo from artist - Daily Express
articles.description: KATE, the Duchess of Cambridge, and Prince William are set to receive a drawing of their dog Lupo who sadly died last week.
